name: Comparison
description: Profile of ArtifactAssessment for Evidence Based Medicine IG. The Comparison Profile is used for assessments of similarities and differences between knowledge artifacts.

element.definition: A formal identifier that is used to identify this Comparison when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

element.definition: Display of or reference to the bibliographic citation of the Comparison.

element.requirements: Consumers must be able to determine any legal restrictions on the use of the Comparison and/or its content.
